description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of lockers and shelves including delivery and installation at 4 different locations in Quebec.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Title (English) / Titre (French):**
Purchase of Lockers and Shelves / Achat de Casiers et Étagères

**Reference Number:**
WS4001540484-Doc4001550755

**Solicitation Number:**
WS4001540484

**Publication Date:**
May 24, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:**
June 27, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST

**Description:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) for the acquisition of lockers and shelves, including delivery and installation at 4 different locations in Quebec.

**Key Requirements:**

* Delivery and installation of lockers and shelves
* Locations: 4 different locations in Quebec
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price

**Eligibility:**

All bids are open to qualified Canadian companies.

**Preferred Partnerships:**

This tender is open to all bidders. Some trade agreements include:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity:**

Quebec (except National Capital Region, NCR)

**Regions of Delivery:**

Quebec (except NCR)

**Contracting Entity:**

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information:**

Corine Lavoie,  SPAC/PSPC, corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

This Request for Proposal (RFP) package is available on the following website:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16368932?extsite=MTYzNjg5MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

All queries should be addressed to the contact person listed above.

### Important Dates:

* Tender Closing Date: June 27, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: 
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

**Disclaimer
